mapper.select: select distinct tname from sys.syscolumns where tname in ( select distinct name from sysobjects where type in ('U','V') and ( name like 'ftbStatMonth%' or name like 'ftbStatHour%' or name like 'ftbStatDay%' or name like 'ftbStatWeek%' ) ) and ( default_value is null or default_value <> 'autoincrement' ) order by tname
select cname from sys.syscolumns where tname=#{tableName} and ( default_value is null or default_value <> 'autoincrement') order by cname
mapper.update: load table ${tableName} (${columns}) from '${filePath}' delimited by '|' escapes off quotes off with checkpoint off
